mapper.select: SELECT a.seid, a.sett_number, a.application_title, a.application_notes, a.request_user, b.person_name, c.account_number, c.payee_name, c.vendor_id, d.vendor_name, a.pay_type, a.company_code, a.sum_money FROM pcms_settlement a LEFT JOIN tpm_employee b ON a.request_user=b.person_code LEFT JOIN pcms_payment c ON c.fssc_bill=a.fccs_bill LEFT JOIN pcms_supplier d on c.vendor_id=d.vendor_id WHERE a.sett_number=#{settNumber}
